name: A Place for the Forgotten (FrankieBu, FeliParamoico)
name_original: A Place for the Forgotten (FrankieBu, FeliParamoico)
description:
This game was created in the Lightbox Academy 1st Game Jam!

How to play:

Your captain has passed away and you, her pirate monkey and best friend, have to save her!!

Memorize the enemies and obstacules before the dark comes out.

Use the keyboard arrows to move and get the exit before the time runs out.

        

TEAM


2D artist - Darío Bueno Gutiérrez

2D artist & Concept artist - Violeta Casado Romero

2D artist & Concept artist - Felipe Cabezon

Game Designer & Technical artist- FrankieBu

Programming - Adrián Pérez de Muniain
